content.question: Which of the following is the primary reason for the rapid population growth in megacities throughout the developing world?

choices.label: A decline in the death rate
The decline in the dependency ratio
A decrease in the doubling time

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
